main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.configgroups

Class MMConfigurationGroupsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.micromanager.configgroups.MMConfigurationGroupsRegistry

  • public class MMConfigurationGroupsRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Class holding a HashMap of the MMConfigurationGroups and their name as displayed in the current Micro-manager session.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MMConfigurationGroupsRegistry(mmcorej.CMMCore core)
      The constructor receives the current Micro-manager core instance and extracts all the configuration groups, building a HashMap.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCurrentMMConfigurationChannel(java.lang.String mmConfigurationGroup)
      Returns the current configuration of the MM configuration group mmConfigurationGroup.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> getMMConfigurationChannels()
      Returns a HashMap mapping the configuration group names (keys) and an array of string representing the names of the different configuration within each group.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,MMConfigurationGroup> getMMConfigurationGroups()
      Returns the MMConfigurationGroups indexed in a map by their name.
      boolean hasMMConfigurationGroup(java.lang.String mmconfig)
      Checks if the configuration group mmconfig exists.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getMMConfigurationChannels

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> getMMConfigurationChannels()
        Returns a HashMap mapping the configuration group names (keys) and an array of string representing the names of the different configuration within each group.
        Returns:
        HashMap of the channels of each MMConfigurationGroup indexed by the name of the group.

      • hasMMConfigurationGroup

        public boolean hasMMConfigurationGroup(java.lang.String mmconfig)
        Checks if the configuration group mmconfig exists.
        Parameters:
        mmconfig - Name of a MMConfigurationGroup
        Returns:
        True if mmconfig exists, false otherwise.

        Returns:
